summary: Reduces the number of gems the Prowler's Profit reward adds to containers.
descriptionHtml:
By default, the reward for collecting the Crown and all of the Stones of Barenziah is a passive ability (Prowler's Profit) that adds 1-4 leveled gems to quite a number of containers.

This simple modification reduces that to 0-1 gems instead. Options are a 25%, 50%, 75%, or 100% chance of adding a single leveled gem.

If using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1840]Wrye Bash[/url] to merge this into a Bashed Patch, make sure to add the Delev tag to it.
author: Jake Zahn
